body_html:
I've been using numba's cuda_array_interface to implement c++-free ROI align function. (https://github.com/dandelin/Wildfire/blob/master/wildfire/optimized_ops/roi_align/roi_align.py#L9-L42) AND it works great for me.

The code was adapted from this issue's snippet (numba/numba#3192).

cuda.select_device(tensor.get_device())
I just added this single line of code to make it work on multiple GPUs. (since tensor.data_ptr() dose not provide which device it's pointing.)
